channel.title: A few questions needign answered please :)
channel.description:
Server: Allstar
Question 1: How would I go in to make someone a Moderator or Administrator?
Question 2: How do I make Quest Capes for Moderator Only?
Question 3: Need a new Anti-Lag Source... with just me alone it's terrible.
Question 4: I type in my no-ip server name and It does not work. I ever have it up and running but it won't let me do it. Can i get some help on that too please?
Thank you for those that help.

item.title: A few questions needign answered please :)
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

allstar is a laggy source anyway. try cleaning out the junk from client class you don’t need.

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions needign answered please :)

item.title: A few questions needign answered please :)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Wolf_Carmen, post:1, topic:272794”]Server: Allstar

Question 1: How would I go in to make someone a Moderator or Administrator?

Question 2: How do I make Quest Capes for Moderator Only?

Question 3: Need a new Anti-Lag Source… with just me alone it’s terrible.

Question 4: I type in my no-ip server name and It does not work. I ever have it up and running but it won’t let me do it. Can i get some help on that too please?

Thank you for those that help.[/quote]

  1. Character folder, or create a command.
  2. playerRights > 0
  3. Most of your lag comes from your ‘process()’ in the client class.
  4. We don’t help with portforwarding questions.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions needign answered please :)
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Question 1: 1-mod 2-admin 3-owner 4-possibly hidden admin

Question 2: Umm by my best guesses i’d say something simular to this…

Just put it in a mod zone? Lol

Question 3: Clean it?

Question 4: Portforward? Maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions needign answered please :)
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

  1. Go to characters folder, open up his account and look for character-rights = 0
    1- Mod
    2 - Admin
    3 - Owner

4)Did you port forward and turn off ur firewall and all?

Read full topic
